subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After beating the 76ers on Tuesday, the Celtics will go for 20 in a row against the Los Angeles Lakers on Christmas Day in a rematch of last spring’s N.B.A. finals.
snippet: After beating the 76ers on Tuesday, the Celtics will go for 20 in a row against the Los Angeles Lakers on Christmas Day in a rematch of last spring’s N.B.A. finals.
